title: Here Comes a Cute Baby—To Kidnap a Daddy as a Gift for My Mommy - Novel Updates
tags: Cute Children   Doting Love Interests   Handsome Male Lead   Marriage of Convenience   Modern Day   Schemes And Conspiracies   Wealthy Characters
author: Qianqiuluo   千秋落
description:
When they met for the first time, the cute baby crawled into Sheng Yeting’s lap and called him “Daddy”.

Unexpectedly, after that, his life changed…

One day, the cute baby told him, “Daddy, an uncle revealed his feelings to Mommy just now.”

“Help Daddy make the bed. I’ll go bring the woman home and have her unable to get up from the bed by teaching her a lesson for good.”

He used to be the merciless and resolute emperor of the business empire, cold and indifferent towards females.

However, he was completely defeated by that woman.

For the rest of their life, he would love her wholeheartedly and give birth to a bunch of little chubby babies.>
